title: Did everyone get kicked from LoL client?
body:
So i finished a game 5 mins ago then i was looking at the shop the LoL just said that 'lost connection' or something
anyways, all of the friends i asked said the got that to as the same time as me while others said it happened before
I'm guessing this has something to do with the poro king game mode or all the problems in the LoL status service 
i think i gotta just wait a few hours
